title: Embed the documents
content:
doc_embds = vo.embed(
    documents, model="voyage-3.5", input_type="document"
).embeddings
python
query = "When is Apple's conference call scheduled?"
python
import numpy as np

code_samples.code: The embeddings will allow us to do semantic search / retrieval in the vector space. Given an example query,
we convert it into an embedding, and conduct a nearest neighbor search to find the most relevant document based on the distance in the embedding space.
